topics.body:
Lucky Star ep23 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]i have gotten to the point where i involuntarily stretch along with Yui in the OP

is Konata's computer autocorrecting things that it shouldn't be? XD

"i didn't check my email for a couple of days!" heck i feel like i missed everything if i was out for a couple of HOURS

DIDN'T I JUST HEAR THIS SCENE THO WHY DO WE NEED TO SEE IT TWICE

ech. that discussion was... just ech. >_>

this girl is basically Mio, drawing stuff that everyone wants to know about but it's too lewd for normal eyes XD

one man's misfortune is another man's comic

creepy dentist :P

"can something stinky be moe?" very interesting question >_>

"it's limited to one per customer" I AM MINAMI AND I DEFY YOUR RULES

stop with the boobs jokes... you were fine with it for a while but now it's just constant and getting really old :/

PROTECT YUTAKA'S INNOCENCE... IT'S NOT LIKE HER INNOCENCE IS UNBREAKABLE OR ANYTHING WHEN WE ACTUALLY TRY TO BREAK IT

posting a huge long thing and getting an error... i know that feel, and it's never a good feel, only soul-crushing disappointment

meanwhile i know i can still look forward to whatever nonsense Lucky Channel is doing anymore

Star Wars? In MY anime? (it's more likely than you think)[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

home stretch time
